title: Diamond Floral Pendant - Vaddanam (Waist Belt)
materials: G Color). Features meticulously placed diamonds in a pave setting for maximum brilliance. Finished with Hyderabadi polish for a lasting luster.
features: A delicate floral motif pendant, perfect for adding a touch of elegance to a Vaddanam/Oddiyanam (waist belt). The design incorporates three symmetrical floral arrangements, each carefully studded with diamonds. The central floral element is elongated, providing a focal point. The design is contemporary yet retains the traditional essence of South Indian craftsmanship.
colors: Yellow Gold and Sparkling White Diamonds
occasions: and formal occasions. Perfect to be paired with a traditional Kanjeevaram saree or a modern lehenga for a touch of timeless elegance. Can also be worn for special family functions or evening events.
description: This exquisitely crafted diamond pendant adds a touch of refined glamour to any outfit. Made with high-quality diamonds and expertly set in 18K gold, this pendant is both durable and beautiful. The floral design is a timeless classic, making it a valuable addition to any jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance and protection against wear and tear.
